file_insights.changes_summary: Added webhook triggers to instance lifecycle methods
key_modifications: Added webhook triggers for create_instance, destroy_instance, pause_instance, and resume_instance
Added user_id parameter to instance lifecycle methods

patterns_discovered: Rate-limited API interaction with exponential backoff
gotchas_discovered: Handling potential lack of running event loop
Preventing webhook errors from disrupting main flow
Supporting both sync and async webhook delivery contexts
recommendations: Add robust error tracking for webhook delivery failures
Add more comprehensive logging for webhook events
Potentially extract webhook firing logic to a more generic service
